org.ruleant.ariadne
Class StoredLocation

java.lang.Object
  org.ruleant.ariadne.StoredLocation
Direct Known Subclasses:
StoredDestination
public class StoredLocation
extends Object

StoredLocation saves a location, it will store a location for future use, and will the save the location when the application is stopped.

Author:
Dieter Adriaenssens
